#include <cstdio>
using namespace std;
int rev(int n){
int rez=1;
int a=1;
while (n/a>0){
if (a==1) rez=n/a%10;
 else rez=(rez*10)+(n/a%10);
a*=10;
}
return rez;
}
int t,n,i;
int main (){

 scanf("%d",&t);
 for (int testc=1;testc<=t;testc++){
  scanf("%d",&n);
  i=n+1;
  while (true){
   if (rev(i)==i){printf("%d\n",i); break;}
   i++;
  }
 }
return 0;
}
